name: Randungeon (Brokennoodles)
description:
A pixel-art platformer that randomly chooses stages and the hazards in those stages

Complete 10 stages as fast as possible! Post your time!

4 random hazards: Lava, Ice, Saws, and Spikes

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Enter or Space to jump

Enter or Space while moving towards wall to wall-jump

R to restart

--------------------------

Credits:

Made by me
Font from Chevy Ray's Pixel Fonts
Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
Sound Effects made in Bfxr
Made on Godot
